name: The Final Flame
description:
Fast paced top down shooter with multiple weapons, enemy types! Use the last flame on the planet to survive multiple waves of monstrous hordes and finally bring down the mother monsters to end the threatening nightmare of eternal darkness.

This was a small project I made to help me learn the ins and outs of Unity and C#. Everything including the art, programming, sound effects, and music was done by me except for the notes in the song's melody which was provided by a friend.

If you have any feedback, good or bad it's appreciated, thanks for playing!
